p: The purified metabolite 293 was tested for antimicrobial activity against selected pathogens namely C. albicans. Funiculosone ( 293) displayed antimicrobial activity inhibiting fungal pathogens. Funiculosone was able to inhibit the growth of C. albicans with an IC 50 (50% inhibitory concentration) of 35 Î¼g/mL [ 95].
